item.title: Help with npcs?
item.dc:creator: @M0R3TANK1NG M0R3TANK1NG
item.description:
@M0R3TANK1NG wrote:

This is my conversation so far:

 		sendNpcChat1("Do you want to buy some runes?", c.talkingNpc, "Aubury");
 		c.nextChat = 2001;
 	break;
    case 2001:
         sendOption2("Yes, please.", "No, thanks.");
         c.dialogueAction = 100;
    break;

First of all, what is “c.dialogueAction” and how would I make it so when he says “Yes, please” it makes the shop appear?

Thank-you for helping.

Read full topic
